Dr. Barbara Odom-Wesley
=======================

Council Member District 8

* Telephone[817-459-6141](tel:8174596141)

![Dr. Barbara Odom-Wesley](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/1/city-council/images/barbara-odom-wesley-horizontal.jpg?dimension=pageimage&w=480)

Represents the entire city.

Dr. Odom-Wesley moved to Arlington from San Antonio, TX in 1980. She has lived in north Arlington for 39 years. She and her husband of 36 years, Curtis, have three adult children. All three were educated in AISD schools and hold master’s degrees. Dr. Odom-Wesley is the daughter of former Arlington Mayor Elzie Odom and Mrs. Ruby Odom.

Professional Background/Memberships
-----------------------------------

Dr. Odom-Wesley is a retired healthcare professor. She taught for 42 years at four universities: University of the Incarnate Word, Texas Woman's University, University of Texas at Arlington, and DeVry University. She has been the president and founder of Medpro Consulting Services since 1991.

[View Council Districts Map(PDF, 887KB)](https://www.arlingtontx.gov/files/assets/city/v/3/city-council/documents/city-council-districts-map.pdf "Opens in a new window")

Council Committees
------------------

(show below)

* Economic Development
* Municipal Policy
* Transportation and Municipal Infrastructure

Council Representation
----------------------

(show below)

* Arlington Housing Finance Corporation
* National League of Cities Race, Equity, and Leadership Council
* National League of Cities Transportation and Infrastructure Services Committee - Vice Chair
* North Central Texas Council of Governments Regional Transportation Council
* Tarrant County Homeless Coalition Continuum of Care
* Tax Increment Reinvestment Zones for 1, 6 & 7
* United Way - Arlington Steering Committee
* Arlington Youth & Families Board
* Ethics Commission

Professional Service
--------------------

(show below)

* Past President, San Antonio and Dallas/Fort Worth Health Information Management Associations
* Past President, Texas Health Information Management Association
* Past President, American Health Information Management Association

Education/Certifications
------------------------

(show below)

* Ph.D. – Health & Family Science, Texas Woman's University
* M.A. – Health, Education, Management, University of the Incarnate Word
* B.S. – Health Information Management, University of the Incarnate Word
* RHIA – Registered Health Information Administrator
* FAHIMA – Fellow, American Health Information Management Association

Civic Service/Community Service/Position
----------------------------------------

(show below)

* United Way – 16 years; Arlington Steering Committee
* Board of Trustees – Texas Health Arlington Memorial Hospital
* Charter Member: Martin Luther King Celebration Committee
* Chartering President: Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Arlington Graduate Chapter
* City Council Committees: Arlington Youth & Families Board, Ethics Commission
* Mentor: Richard Greene Scholar Program

Memberships/Position
--------------------

(show below)

* Board Member: North Texas Area Community Health Clinics
* Board of Directors: Martin Luther King Celebration Committee
* Member: Health Impact Leadership Council – Texas Health Resources
* AISD Back to School Kickoff - Health Resources Chair
* Group Leader Bible Study Fellowship
* Married Couples Ministry Covenant Church
* Past Presidents’ Council Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority, Arlington Graduate Chapter
* Emeritus Member: American Health Information Management Association
* Life Member: NAACP and Chair, Health Committee for Arlington Branch
* Life Member: Alpha Kappa Alpha Sorority

Contact Your Council Member
---------------------------

Do you have questions or comments for your Council Member? You are encouraged to contact your Council Member.

Electoral Information

**At Large  
Mayor Pro Tempore**

Term Expires: May 2026
